td.content: s:a 51 yr old M diamond cutter c/o 6 weeks h/o mild delusional thoughts and frantic speech and mild upset that coworkers deliberately try to be irritating because they are jealous. NKDA. denies any alcohol use he has been a chronic smoker for the last 4 years o:Height 191 cm, Weight 104.8 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed paliperidone - 6 mg daily (in a.m.), and ordered Mental Status exam.
